Package bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.controllers

Class LibraryController

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.controllers.LibraryController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Controller
public class LibraryController extends Object implements Controller
Controller class that handles the execution of various library operations. This includes adding books and patrons, renewing and returning books, among others. It acts as an intermediary between the GUI and the underlying command classes.

    Constructs a LibraryController with a reference to the Library and the main GUI window.

      public LibraryController(Library library, MainWindow mainWindow)
      Constructs a LibraryController with a reference to the Library and the main GUI window.
      Parameters:
      library - The library which this controller will manipulate.
      mainWindow - The main window of the application's GUI.

  • Method Details

    • executeAction

      public void executeAction(String actionCommand)
      Executes a specific action based on the provided command string. This can include actions like adding a book or a patron, based on the command.
      Specified by:
      executeAction in interface Controller
      Parameters:
      actionCommand - The command that dictates which action to perform.

    • addBook

      public void addBook(String title, String author, String publicationYear, String publisher) throws LibraryException
      Adds a book to the library.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the book to add.
      author - The author of the book.
      publicationYear - The publication year of the book.
      publisher - The publisher of the book.
      Throws:
      LibraryException - If there is an error in adding the book.

    • addPatron

      public void addPatron(String name, String phone, String email, List<Integer> bookIds) throws LibraryException
      Adds a patron to the library.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the patron.
      phone - The phone number of the patron.
      email - The email address of the patron.
      bookIds - The IDs of books associated with the patron.
      Throws:
      LibraryException - If there is an error in adding the patron.

    • hideBooks

      public void hideBooks(List<Integer> bookIds) throws LibraryException
      Hides books from the library system by their IDs.
      Parameters:
      bookIds - The list of book IDs to be hidden.
      Throws:
      LibraryException - If there is an error in hiding the books.

    • deletePatron

      public void deletePatron(List<Integer> patronIds) throws LibraryException
      Deletes patrons with the specified patron IDs.
      Parameters:
      patronIds - The list of patron IDs to be deleted.
      Throws:
      LibraryException - If there are issues with deleting patrons.

    • renewBook

      public void renewBook(int patronId, int bookId) throws LibraryException
      Renews a book for a patron.
      Parameters:
      patronId - The ID of the patron who wants to renew the book.
      bookId - The ID of the book to be renewed.
      Throws:
      LibraryException - If there are issues with renewing the book.

    • returnBook

      public void returnBook(int patronId, int bookId) throws LibraryException
      Returns a book to the library.
      Parameters:
      patronId - The ID of the patron returning the book.
      bookId - The ID of the book to be returned.
      Throws:
      LibraryException - If there are issues with returning the book.
